attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! So I downloaded this because I just lovvveee Donald Jenius Trump and when I got It was normal at first but then it told me YOU BETTER VOTE FOR DONALD JENIUS TRUMP OR IM GOING TO KILL YOUR DOG(it said dog because I told them I had a dog)I got so scared because I love my dog so I said ok😰😢please don’t hurt my baby.THAT WASN’T the end tho,when I said ok it then told me to hate Bernie and call him sleepy joe but when I told them that I don’t want to call him that they said “you better call him that or the WHOLE White House is going to slap everyone in your WHOLE family and throw all of the baby’s in the ocean.I was so scared I was crying at this point, they said “say it right now SAY it out loud in public”when I told I said(I didn’t really say it)they told me I was lying and that THEY CAN SEE ME at that point I was almost drowning in my own tears from how scared I was.So I deleted the app cause I was just so scared IT WAS RUINING MY LIFEE😱😢😣😡so I’m just warning ALL OF YOU 🚫❌DO NOT🚫❌get this app unless you are brave enough too😜😛🥰😎🤪🏳️‍🌈❤️
attributes.title: I am scared for my life!!!😛😔🤡😰

attributes.review:
Now that Trump is dead I don't see a reason to have this on the app store anymore. Yeah we're all upset and "grieving"😒 but it's time to get over it. Besides the fact that this app is completely pointless, as soon as i downloaded it bad things started to happen. Innocent black people across the country have been dying, and even more people were injured while peacefully protesting, and i have no other reason to believe this app isn't behind it. Not to MENTION my goldfish drowned this morning🥺. I am also very disappointed that this app fails to mention the rise in popularity of the manny flag. The first movie came out ten years ago, it was around longer than the whole confederacy which was only around for like four years. Manny is an important part of our history and we can NOT silence him. 
Black lives matter
LGBTQ+ rights 
Let women do what they want with their bodies 
✨🧚‍♀️✨Trump 2020🧚‍♀️🌟✨In his grave☺️🧚‍♀️✨🧚
                                ~Alaina Daniluk 6/28/2020
attributes.title: R.I.P. Trump✨🧚‍♀️
